Comment: If anybody doesn't know, especially those of you poking fun at the phrasing:   Those specific words "arbitrary and capricious" carry legal ramifications, as they are the specific legal language used to describe actions that are not allowed in this context.
Author: enjoycarrots

Comment: A speeding ticket?    A speeding ticket?  Well, why didn't you say so? That's a very serious crime. We can't allow foreigners with speeding tickets into our country because it might corrupt our youth.   Next thing you know they'll be jaywalking.
